captions.text:
President of United States?
Nobel Prize Winner? Fabio Cannavaro?

"The trophies look
nice in your apartment."

"But where is the golden one
for player of the year?"

And now, please
allow Zlatan to retort.
May Zlatan firstly ask you this:

Do you have your own animated
show with you as the host?

Has anyone made you your very own
upholstered throne and matching ottoman?
And lastly, back heel into the fire.
